WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
I have the following scenario: two TreeViewEx controls hosted in tabs, I want to synchronize them so that an update to one of them causes updates in the other. 
The problem is that when I switch the tabs, the tree control that is hosted in the hidden tab will be unloaded. In TreeViewEx, in OnUnLoaded event handler we have:

 Selection = null;

The control will try to call ParentTreeView.Selection.ClearObsoleteItems in OnItemsChanged handler of TreeViewExItem. This of course results in NullReference crash.
The same happens in OnPropertyChanged (calls ParentTreeView.Selection.SelectFromProperty)

Would be great if this could be fixed in the official version of the control :-)

Best Regards,
Ola
WorkItem.Summary: Tree Crash when hosting in tab panes
